post.text: My childcare plan allows for every family in America to deduct childcare expenses from their income taxes -- MORE money in your pockets, MORE freedom to make the decisions that suit YOUR family's needs. AMERICA First means FAMILIES First!

comment.author: Cyonna
comment.text: So many uneducated cucks infesting the page. how sad. If you actually think Hilary is better in ANY way, do the world a favor. Don't vote. Better yet, dont breed.

replies.author: Cassidy
replies.text: You trumpanzees sure love that word. Why are you so obsesses with other people's dicks?

replies.author: Cyonna
replies.text: Just call them how we see them. Man you people just look and sound more foolish with every word you manage to spew out of that tiny head of yours.

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: Trump supporters do appear to corner the market on rudeness, name-calling, and spreading misinformation.

replies.author: Cyonna
replies.text: You people are completely and utterly delusional. Please leave the country. Go to Canada or the UK to be mindless zombies.
